#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); 
 long long int t,n,x;
 //cin>>t;
 scanf("%lld",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
  scanf("%lld",&n);
  //cin>>n;
  x=(int)(sqrt(n));//cout<<x<<'\n';
  printf("%lld\n",x);
  //cout<<x<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
